question:
Commercial production of which of the following has/have been already started in India?
  1. Coal Bed Methane
  2. Tight Oil
  3. Shale Gas
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: Commercial production of CBM in India has already commenced from July 2007 in Raniganj (South) block in West Bengal. It is being operated by Great Eastern Energy Corporation Limited (GEECL). Oil and Natural Gas Corporation (ONGC) has planned to start commercial production of shale gas but still has not started to do so. Tight oil is also known as shale oil. It is light crude oil contained in petroleum-bearing formations of low permeability. It is still not produced in India.
